commands.name: help
commands.info: Sends you, well... this message.

commands.name: setprefix
commands.info: Changes my prefix settings.

commands.name: nuke
commands.info: Deletes a certain number of past messages

commands.name: cleanse
commands.info: Deletes a certain number of past bot related message.

commands.name: setwelcome
commands.info: Changes the channel I send welcome messages to.

commands.name: setlogs
commands.info: Changes the channel I keep logs in.

commands.name: setwarnings
commands.info: Changes the channel I send mod warnings to, log channel by default.

commands.name: echo
commands.info: Sends a custom message to a channel.

commands.name: ignore
commands.info: Ignores or unignores all conversation and commands from a user.

commands.name: pfp
commands.info: Fetches the profile picture of the user.

commands.name: ch
commands.info: Sends a random Cyanide and Happiness comic.

commands.name: serverinfo
commands.info: Lists information about the current server.

commands.name: botinfo
commands.info: Shows some information about me.

commands.name: uptime
commands.info: Show the amount I've gone since my last restart.

commands.name: source
commands.info: Sends my source code on github.

commands.name: setmood
commands.info: Change my chat settings. **currently WIP**

commands.name: mute
commands.info: Mutes a user for a set amount of time. Muted users cannot react to or send messages.
commands.example: mute @Xetera 60 stop being rude to people

commands.name: hints
commands.info: Changes my response for when users enter an invalid command.

commands.name: invitefilter
commands.info: Changes my settings for filtering invites, mods can always send invites regardless.

commands.name: settings hints
commands.info: Determines whether I respond to invalid commands with a hint or not.

commands.name: settings strikelimit
commands.info: Sets the limit of maximum strikes a user can have before getting banned **{{prefix}}help strike** for more info on infractions.

commands.name: settings reactions
commands.info: Toggles the reaction thumbnails I put on some of replies.

commands.name: settings tracking
commands.info: Toggles my tracking mode for new members. When enabled, people who have joined in the past 5 minutes will get banned after 2 server invites rather than waiting for the invite limit and get banned instead of getting muted once I detect them spamming.

commands.name: settings invites
commands.info:
Changes my settings for removing invites.
**on** - invites are allowed, I don't check messages for them
**off** - All invites by non-mods get removed, logged and added to the user's history.

commands.name: settings invitewarn
commands.info: Number of discord invites required to DM a user about getting banned for advertising.

commands.name: settings inviteban
commands.info: Number of discord invites required to ban a user for advertising.

commands.name: note
commands.info: Adds a note to a user. All user information including notes can be looked up by mods.
commands.example: note @Xetera keeps sending pepe memes, ban them next time.

commands.name: deletenote
commands.info: Deletes a user note by ID.

commands.name: history
commands.info: Fetches the history of a user including things like infractions, notes, join date and watchlist status.

commands.name: addmacro
commands.info: Adds a new macro. Macros are special commands that you can add to make me respond with a specific message or picture URL.
commands.example: addmacro rolepls Be patient, you'll have to be active first to get a role

commands.name: macros
commands.info: Lists all the macros I have saved on this server.

commands.name: deletemacro
commands.info: Deletes a saved macro from the server.

commands.name: randomquote
commands.info: Sends a random quote by someone.

commands.name: reactions
commands.info: Toggles the gif/image reactions I add to some of my replies

commands.name: warn
commands.info: Sends a warning to a member in DMs, alias for a 0 weight strike.
commands.example: warn @Xetera Posting nsfw pics is not allowed.

commands.name: strike
commands.info: Infracts a user with a variable weight, this sends them a DM and adds the infraction to their record. The user is banned if the total of their non-expired strikes go over the strike limit of the server.
commands.example: strike Xetera 2 This is your last warning before getting banned.

commands.name: snipe
commands.info: Removes all messages by the user in the current channel going back X messages

commands.name: setgreeting
commands.info:
Changes my random greeting message to a custom one.
__Placeholders__ (these get replaced in the message when users join):

**{greeting}** - random old greeting message
**{mention}** - mentions the user
**{username}** - user's username
**{id}** - user id
**{discrim}** - the users discriminator
**{status}** - the status of the user (online/offline)
 __Fields__
**%title%** - changes the title
**%description%** - changes the description
**%footer%** - changes the footer.
commands.example:
setgreeting
%title% Hey {mention}, welcome to the team!
%description% Check out #rules first {mention}!
%footer% Your ID: {id}

commands.name: embed
commands.info:
Creates a new embed using a template, possible fields include
**%title%**
**%description%**
**%field1(2, 3, 4 etc)%**
**%value1(2, 3, 4 etc)%**
**%thumbnail%**
**%image%**
**%footer%**
**%color%** (name or hex).
commands.example:
embed
%title% Rules
%description% Here are the rules!
%field1% No spamming
%value1% Thanks
%color% red
%footer% boi

commands.name: sendembed
commands.info: Sends an embed you've previously created

commands.name: editembed
commands.info: Edits an embed you've previously created. This just modifies the existing instead of creating a new one.

commands.name: ihateyou
commands.info: Breaks my heart.

commands.name: doggo
commands.info: Sends a random pupperino.

commands.name: suggest
commands.info: Make a suggestion to the server, this gets sent to the moderators first to be reviewed before getting posted publicly.

commands.name: suggestions
commands.info:
Searches through the queue of unread suggestions, approved suggestions get posted to a public channel to be voted on by everyone.

__Reactions__
**Prev** goes to the previous suggestion
**Next** Goes to the next suggestion
**Approve** Approves the suggestion and posts it publicly
**Deny** Discards the suggestion
**Quit** Quits the menu

commands.name: accept
commands.info: Accepts a public suggestion, changing its status in the suggestions channel. The member that made the suggestion also gets notified with a DM
commands.example: accept 88 fixed typo in the rules

commands.name: reject
commands.info: Rejects a public suggestion, changing its status in the suggestions channel. The member that made the suggestion also gets notified with a DM
commands.example: reject 44 we're never adding a nsfw channel

commands.name: ignoredusers
commands.info: Gets a list of everyone I'm ignoring.

commands.name: invite
commands.info: Sends a link to invite me to your server and to join my support server.

commands.name: log
commands.info:
Changes the channels where I keep my logs at or turns them off completely.

__Categories__
**everything** - changes all logging settings
**warnings** - sets all warning channels
**logs** - sets all non-warning, log channels
**channels** - channel creation and deletion
**joins** - when members join the server
**leaves** - when members leave the server
**mutes** - on assigning the muted role to someone
**invites** - on deleting invites to other servers
**bans** - when someone is banned or unbanned (pulls the ban reason from audit logs)
**unbans** - when a user is unbanned
**suggestions** - when someone submits a new suggestion via **{{prefix}}suggest**
**pings** - when someone mentions `@`everyone or `@`here
**commands** - when someone uses a stealth command

commands.name: anime
commands.info: Sends a bunch of info about an anime

commands.name: setsuggestions
commands.info: Changes the channel for suggestions

commands.name: daily
commands.info: Checks to see if it's time to be paid by the Bank of Hifumi.

commands.name: balance
commands.info: Peek at your own or someone else's balance.

commands.name: test
commands.info: Peek at your own or someone else's balance.
